mapper.select: SELECT (select count(b.queue_seq) from wbmp_bqms_queue b WHERE b.queue_status = '0' and concat(substr(b.branch,1,6),'01') = #{branch} and DATE_FORMAT(b.data_dt,'%Y%m%d') = #{nowStr}) as queue_cnt, (select count(b.queue_seq) from wbmp_bqms_queue b WHERE b.queue_status = '1' and concat(substr(b.branch,1,6),'01') = #{branch} and DATE_FORMAT(b.data_dt,'%Y%m%d') = #{nowStr}) as progress_handle_cnt, (select count(b.queue_seq) from wbmp_bqms_queue b WHERE b.queue_status = '2' and concat(substr(b.branch,1,6),'01') = #{branch} and DATE_FORMAT(b.data_dt,'%Y%m%d') = #{nowStr}) as already_handle_cnt, (select count(b.queue_seq) from wbmp_bqms_queue b WHERE b.queue_status = '3' and concat(substr(b.branch,1,6),'01') = #{branch} and DATE_FORMAT(b.data_dt,'%Y%m%d') = #{nowStr}) as abandoned_cnt, (SELECT COUNT( DISTINCT wbn.win_num ) FROM wbmp_bqms_win wbn WHERE concat(substr(wbn.branch,1,6),'01') = #{branch} AND wbn.status1 = '1') as num, q.ABANDONED_LV as abandoned_lv,q.INDEX_CNT as index_cnt from wbmp_operate_bqms_queue_avg q where q.ORG_ID = #{branch} and DATE_FORMAT(q.DATA_DT,'%Y%m%d') = #{nowStr}

SELECT (select count(device_id) from wbmp_atmp_basic_info WHERE ORG_ID=#{orgId} ) as deviceTotal, (SELECT COUNT(a.DEVICE_TYPE) FROM (SELECT DEVICE_TYPE FROM wbmp_atmp_basic_info WHERE ORG_ID=#{orgId} GROUP BY DEVICE_TYPE) a) as deviceTypeTotal

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(device_id) from wbmp_atmp_basic_info WHERE ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND device_run_status in('-1','5','7','11') ) as 'offline', (SELECT COUNT(device_id) from wbmp_atmp_basic_info WHERE ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND device_run_status in('0','1','10') ) as 'online', (SELECT COUNT(device_id) from wbmp_atmp_basic_info WHERE ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND device_run_status in('2','6') ) as 'error', (SELECT COUNT(device_id) from wbmp_atmp_basic_info WHERE ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND device_run_status in('3','4','8') ) as 'maintena'

SELECT CASE WHEN a.DICT_ITEM_VALUE IS NULL THEN ati.trans_name ELSE a.DICT_ITEM_TITLE END AS trans_name, SUM(ati.trans_cnt) AS sum FROM wbmp_atmp_tran_info ati LEFT JOIN ( SELECT di.DICT_ITEM_VALUE, di.DICT_ITEM_TITLE FROM t_dictionary d INNER JOIN t_dictionary_item di ON d.DICT_ID = di.DICT_ID WHERE d.DICT_NAME = 'BUSINESS_TYPE' ) a ON a.DICT_ITEM_VALUE = ati.trans_name WHERE ati.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND ati.DATA_DT=CURDATE() GROUP BY trans_name ORDER BY sum DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT SUM(trans_cnt) sum FROM wbmp_atmp_tran_info WHERE ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND DATA_DT=CURDATE() GROUP BY ORG_ID

SELECT tran_name trans_name,SUM(trade_volume) sum FROM wbmp_abs_transinfo WHERE flag='2' AND DATA_DT=CURDATE() AND concat(substr(ORG_ID,1,6),'01')=#{orgId} GROUP BY tran_name ORDER BY sum DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT a.*, b.callNum, c.trade_volume, d.trade_volume trade_volume_sum, e.onLineTime FROM wbmp_abs_teller_info a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TELLER_ID,COUNT(queue_num) callNum FROM wbmp_bqms_queue WHERE TELLER_ID is NOT NULL AND queue_status='2' AND data_dt=CURDATE() GROUP BY TELLER_ID ) b ON a.TELLER_ID=b.TELLER_ID LEFT JOIN wbmp_abs_transinfo c ON a.TELLER_ID = c.TELLER_ID AND c.flag = '3' AND c.DATA_DT = CURDATE() LEFT JOIN wbmp_abs_transinfo d ON a.ORG_ID = concat(substr(d.ORG_ID,1,6),'01') AND d.flag = '1' AND d.DATA_DT = CURDATE() LEFT JOIN ( SELECT teller_id, sum( sub_seconds ) onlineTime FROM ( SELECT A.teller_id, A.ORG_ID, A.INTERFACECODE, A.recordtime, TIMESTAMPDIFF( SECOND, A.recordtime, B.recordtime ) sub_seconds FROM ( SELECT a.*,( @i := @i + 1 ) AS ord_num FROM wbmp_abs_online_time a,( SELECT @i := 1 ) d WHERE a.RTNCODE = '00000000' AND a.DATA_DT = CURDATE() ORDER BY teller_id, recordtime ) AS A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.*,( @j := @j + 1 ) AS ord_num FROM wbmp_abs_online_time a,( SELECT @j := 0 ) c WHERE RTNCODE = '00000000' AND DATA_DT = CURDATE() ORDER BY teller_id, recordtime ) AS B ON A.ord_num = B.ord_num AND A.teller_id = B.teller_id ) e WHERE INTERFACECODE = 'NLTTSM_5201' AND sub_seconds IS NOT NULL GROUP BY teller_id ) e ON a.TELLER_ID = e.TELLER_ID WHERE a.ORG_ID=#{orgId}

SELECT COUNT(TELLER_ID) FROM wbmp_abs_teller_info WHERE teller_ind = '1'
and ORG_ID=#{orgId}

SELECT SUM(trade_volume) FROM wbmp_abs_transinfo WHERE DATA_DT=CURDATE() AND flag=1
and concat(substr(ORG_ID,1,6),'01')=#{orgId}

SELECT sum( sub_seconds ) onlineTime FROM ( SELECT A.teller_id, A.INTERFACECODE, A.ORG_ID, A.recordtime, TIMESTAMPDIFF( SECOND, A.recordtime, B.recordtime ) sub_seconds FROM ( SELECT a.*,( @i := @i + 1 ) AS ord_num FROM wbmp_abs_online_time a,( SELECT @i := 1 ) d WHERE a.RTNCODE = '00000000' AND a.DATA_DT = CURDATE() ORDER BY teller_id, recordtime ) AS A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.*,( @j := @j + 1 ) AS ord_num FROM wbmp_abs_online_time a,( SELECT @j := 0 ) c WHERE RTNCODE = '00000000' AND DATA_DT = CURDATE() ORDER BY teller_id, recordtime ) AS B ON A.ord_num = B.ord_num AND A.teller_id = B.teller_id ) e WHERE INTERFACECODE = 'NLTTSM_5201' AND sub_seconds IS NOT NULL
and ORG_ID=#{orgId}

SELECT CASE device_type WHEN 1 THEN '智慧厅堂' WHEN 2 THEN '智慧柜台' WHEN 3 THEN 'ATM' WHEN 4 THEN 'CRS快柜' WHEN 5 THEN '壹站通' WHEN 6 THEN '回单打印机' WHEN 7 THEN '智能现金柜' END AS deviceName, term_no AS termNo, CASE device_run_status WHEN 10 THEN '在线' WHEN 11 THEN '离线' WHEN -1 THEN '无效' WHEN 0 THEN '空闲' WHEN 1 THEN '交易中' WHEN 2 THEN '故障' WHEN 3 THEN '暂停服务' WHEN 4 THEN '维护中' WHEN 5 THEN '通信中断' WHEN 6 THEN '耗材尽' WHEN 7 THEN '已关机' WHEN 8 THEN '重启中' END AS deviceRunStatus, device_id as deviceId FROM wbmp_atmp_basic_info where ORG_ID=#{orgId}

select CASE device_run_status WHEN 10 THEN '在线' WHEN 11 THEN '离线' WHEN -1 THEN '空闲' WHEN 0 THEN '交易中' WHEN 1 THEN '故障' WHEN 2 THEN '暂停服务' WHEN 3 THEN '维护中' WHEN 4 THEN '通信中断' WHEN 5 THEN '耗材尽' WHEN 6 THEN '已关机' WHEN 7 THEN '重启中' END AS deviceRunStatus, device_vendor as deviceVendor, device_model as deviceModel, card_reader as cardReader, rfcard_reader as rfcardReader, pin_pad as pinPad, journal_printer as journalPrinter, cash_dispenser as cashDispenser, cash_acceptor as cashAcceptor, receipt_printer as receiptPrinter, statement_printer as statementPrinter, passbook_printer as passbookPrinter FROM wbmp_atmp_basic_info where device_id=#{deviceId}

SELECT CONVERT (t2.day_str, CHAR) `date`, IFNULL(sum(i.trans_cnt), 0) AS tradeCount FROM ( SELECT @rownum :=@rownum + 1 AS num, date_format( DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL @rownum DAY), '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS day_str FROM (SELECT @rownum := - 1) AS r_init, ( SELECT c.trans_cnt FROM wbmp_atmp_tran_info c LIMIT 30 ) AS c_init ) t2 LEFT JOIN wbmp_atmp_tran_info AS i ON ( CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(i.data_dt, '%Y'), '-', DATE_FORMAT(i.data_dt, '%m'), '-', DATE_FORMAT(i.data_dt, '%d') ) = t2.day_str and i.term_no = #{termNo} and i.org_id = #{orgId} ) GROUP BY t2.day_str

SELECT CONVERT (t2.day_str, CHAR) `date`, IFNULL(sum(i.trans_cnt), 0) AS tradeCount FROM ( SELECT @rownum :=@rownum + 1 AS num, date_format( DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL @rownum MONTH), '%Y-%m' ) AS day_str FROM (SELECT @rownum := - 1) AS r_init, ( SELECT c.trans_cnt FROM wbmp_atmp_tran_info c LIMIT 12 ) AS c_init ) t2 LEFT JOIN wbmp_atmp_tran_info AS i ON ( CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(i.data_dt, '%Y'), '-', DATE_FORMAT(i.data_dt, '%m') ) = t2.day_str and i.term_no = #{termNo} and i.org_id = #{orgId} ) GROUP BY t2.day_str
